name: aws-oauth-proxy-lambda
description: An AWS Lambda Authorizer implementation of the Token Handler's OAuth Proxy module.

scripts.package: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build; cd dist; zip ../aws-oauth-proxy-lambda.zip -r *.js; cd ..; zip -r aws-oauth-proxy-lambda.zip .env node_modules/cookie node_modules/dotenv

author: Curity AB
